${ModID}:SimplifiedStrike.NAME: Simplified Strike
${ModID}:SimplifiedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your *Basic cards.

${ModID}:PerfectBasics.NAME: Perfect Basics
${ModID}:PerfectBasics.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you play a *Basic card, gain !M! Block. Exhaust.

${ModID}:BackToBasics.NAME: Back to Basics
${ModID}:BackToBasics.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Add a *Bash, *Strike, *Neutralize, *Survivor, *Zap, *Dualcast, *Eruption, *Vigilance, *Rummage and *Cardistry to your hand. Exhaust.

${ModID}:Simplicity.NAME: Simplicity
${ModID}:Simplicity.DESCRIPTION: Place !M! random *Basic cards from your draw pile into your hand.
